titleStmt.title: Proclamation for the Convention of Estates
titleStmt.author: Scotland. Sovereign (1649-1685 : Charles II)
Charles II, King of England, 1630-1685.
Scotland. Convention of Estates.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Evan Tyler, printer to the Kings most Excellent Majesty,

notesStmt.note: Royal arms at head of text; initial letter.
Dated at end: Given at Our Court at Whitehall, the twenty fifth of October, one thousand six hundred and sixty six, and of Our Reign the eighteenth year.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
